Package main.java.com.spaceexplorer.repository

Interface Repository<T,ID>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of entity managed by the repository
ID - The type of the entity's identifier
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameRepository, ItemRepository, PlayerRepository
public interface Repository<T,ID>
Generic repository interface defining standard CRUD operations. Provides a common contract for all repositories in the application.
Since:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • save

      void save(T entity)
      Saves an entity to the repository.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to save
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the entity is invalid

    • findById

      Optional<T> findById(ID id)
      Finds an entity by its identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - The identifier of the entity to find
      Returns:
      Optional containing the entity if found

    • findAll

      List<T> findAll()
      Returns all entities in the repository.
      Returns:
      List of all entities

    • delete

      void delete(ID id)
      Deletes an entity by its identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - The identifier of the entity to delete

    • update

      void update(ID id, T entity)
      Updates an existing entity.
      Parameters:
      id - The identifier of the entity to update
      entity - The new entity data
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the entity is not found or invalid

    • exists

      boolean exists(ID id)
      Checks if an entity exists by its identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - The identifier to check
      Returns:
      true if the entity exists, false otherwise
